== Main inclusion report for docbook2x ==

=== Requirements ===

1. ''Availability:'' `http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/d/docbook2x/`, compiled on all arches.

2. ''Rationale:'' New build dependency of `gnome-doc-utils`.

3. ''Security:''
* No CANs.
* No Secunia record.
* No suid or sgid bit set.
* Binaries to /usr/bin.

4. ''QA:''
* Bugs: 2 "normal" Debian bugs.

5. ''Standards compliance:''
* Standard `CDBS` packaging.
* FHS met.
* Debian package policy met.
